alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 7:29PM EDT until July 21 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Somerset County in west central Maine... Central Franklin County in western Maine... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 728 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Eustis, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eustis, Rangeley, Kingfield, Bingham, Carrabassett Valley, Dallas Plantation, Brighton Plantation, Caratunk Plantation, Dead River, Tim Pond, Carrying Place, Bigelow, Moscow, Highland Plantation, Wyman, Bald Mountain, Coplin Plantation, Pierce Pond, Lang and Mayfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
